description: This version of the  Old Man emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platforms. Copy
apple_vendor_description: The old man emoji on Apple devices presents a distinguished figure with a warm, dark skin tone, thoughtfully rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle, soft gradients. His face, depicted with gentle wrinkles and a kind expression, is framed by soft, rounded edges, conveying wisdom and experience. This emoji, symbolizing age, knowledge, or a beloved elder, offers a touch of gravitas and affectionate respect in digital communication on Apple devices.
